# probounds.probounds_crosstab_feature { #probounds.probounds.probounds_crosstab_feature }

```python
probounds.probounds_crosstab_feature(raw_data, datatype, feature)
```

Build crosstabs for every category of ``feature``.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name     | Type                                  | Description                                                                           | Default           |
|----------|---------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------|
| raw_data | FrameLike                             | Input dataset that includes the ``feature`` column alongside ``trt`` and ``outcome``. | _required_        |
| datatype | (\'observational\', \'experimental\') | The type of study represented by ``raw_data``.                                        | `"observational"` |
| feature  | str                                   | Column used to split the dataset prior to computing crosstabs.                        | _required_        |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                               | Description                                                         |
|--------|------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | dict\[Hashable, polars.DataFrame\] | Mapping from each feature value to its probability bounds crosstab. |
